mil3.7.14:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.7.14:1.2_0: “Is it possible to cut down all around while profound?”
mil3.7.14:1.3_0: “Great king, I can do all matters.”
mil3.7.14:1.5_0: “Great king, all things are not deficient in bliss, no profound or happiness—you’re said to be ‘By all around’.
mil3.7.14:1.6_0: You can cut anyone’t cut off the second cutting off. And you’ll cut it off by wisdom.”
